title: Annapurna Circuit Trek
description: Discover the diverse landscapes of the Annapurna region on this classic circuit trek through varied terrain and cultures.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Arrive at Tribhuvan International Airport. Transfer to hotel. Trip briefing and preparation.

itinerary.title: Drive to Besisahar, Trek to Bhulbhule
itinerary.description: Drive to Besisahar and begin trek to Bhulbhule (840m). Walking time: 5-6 hours.

itinerary.title: Trek to Jagat
itinerary.description: Trek through terraced fields and traditional villages to Jagat (1,300m).

itinerary.title: Trek to Dharapani
itinerary.description: Continue trekking through beautiful landscapes to Dharapani (1,960m).

itinerary.title: Trek to Chame
itinerary.description: Trek to Chame (2,710m), the district headquarters of Manang.

fitness_requirements: Moderate physical fitness required. Regular walking exercise recommended.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 15 days before departure

title: Chitwan Safari Adventure
description: Explore Nepal's premier wildlife destination with jungle safaris, elephant encounters, and bird watching in Chitwan National Park.

activities.name: Wildlife Safari
activities.description: 4WD jungle safari to spot rhinos, tigers, and other wildlife

activities.name: Bird Watching
activities.description: Over 500 bird species in the park

activities.name: Cultural Experience
activities.description: Traditional Tharu culture and dance performances

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Chitwan
itinerary.description: Drive from Kathmandu to Chitwan (5-6 hours). Check-in at resort. Evening cultural program.

itinerary.title: Full Day Safari Activities
itinerary.description: Early morning bird watching, jungle safari, canoe ride, elephant breeding center visit, and evening cultural show.

itinerary.title: Morning Activities and Return
itinerary.description: Morning jungle walk, final wildlife spotting, and drive back to Kathmandu.

fitness_requirements: Basic fitness level sufficient. Suitable for all ages.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 3 days before departure

title: Everest Base Camp Trek
description: Experience the ultimate adventure with our Everest Base Camp trek. Journey through the heart of the Himalayas and witness breathtaking mountain views.

activities.name: Mountain Views
activities.description: Spectacular views of world's highest peaks

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Arrive at Tribhuvan International Airport. Transfer to hotel. Trip briefing and preparation.

itinerary.title: Fly to Lukla, Trek to Phakding
itinerary.description: Early morning flight to Lukla (2,840m). Begin trek to Phakding (2,610m). Walking time: 3-4 hours.

itinerary.title: Trek to Namche Bazaar
itinerary.description: Trek to Namche Bazaar (3,440m), the gateway to Everest. Cross suspension bridges and enter Sagarmatha National Park.

itinerary.title: Acclimatization Day in Namche
itinerary.description: Rest day for acclimatization. Optional hike to Everest View Hotel or visit local markets.

itinerary.title: Trek to Tengboche
itinerary.description: Trek to Tengboche (3,860m). Visit the famous Tengboche Monastery with stunning mountain views.

fitness_requirements: Good physical fitness required. Regular cardio exercise recommended 2-3 months before trek.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 15 days before departure

title: Luxury Experience - Kailash Mansarovar
description: Premium luxury pilgrimage with helicopter access, private ceremonies, and personal spiritual guide. The ultimate comfort journey to the sacred mountain with luxury accommodations and exclusive services.

itinerary.title: Luxury Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: VIP arrival, luxury hotel accommodation, and personal briefing with spiritual guide.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Preparation Day
itinerary.description: Spiritual preparation, permit processing, and luxury shopping for the journey.

itinerary.title: Private Flight to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Private charter flight to Nepalgunj with luxury ground services.

itinerary.title: Helicopter to Simikot
itinerary.description: Private helicopter flight to Simikot with scenic mountain views.

itinerary.title: Simikot to Hilsa Border
itinerary.description: Luxury ground transport to Tibet border with VIP processing.

itinerary.title: Hilsa to Taklakot
itinerary.description: Cross into Tibet with expedited processing and luxury accommodation.

itinerary.title: Acclimatization in Taklakot
itinerary.description: Rest day with spa services and spiritual preparation.

itinerary.title: Taklakot to Mansarovar
itinerary.description: Luxury transport to sacred Lake Mansarovar with private ceremony.

itinerary.title: Sacred Mansarovar Experience
itinerary.description: Full day at Mansarovar with private spiritual ceremonies and meditation.

itinerary.title: Mansarovar to Darchen
itinerary.description: Luxury transport to Darchen with premium camping setup.

itinerary.title: Kailash Parikrama Day 1
itinerary.description: Begin sacred circumambulation with personal guide and support team.

itinerary.title: Kailash Parikrama Day 2
itinerary.description: Cross Dolma La Pass with helicopter support if needed.

itinerary.title: Kailash Parikrama Day 3
itinerary.description: Complete the sacred circuit and return to luxury base camp.

itinerary.title: Darchen to Taklakot
itinerary.description: Luxury return journey with celebration dinner.

itinerary.title: Taklakot to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: VIP border crossing and private flight back to Kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Luxury departure services and blessed farewell.

title: Sacred Journey - Kailash Mansarovar
description: Embark on the most sacred pilgrimage on Earth. Experience the divine presence of Lord Shiva at Mount Kailash and cleanse your spirit in the holy waters of Lake Mansarovar.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Arrive in Kathmandu, meet our team, and prepare for the sacred journey ahead.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Fly to Nepalgunj and prepare for border crossing to Tibet.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj to Simikot to Hilsa
itinerary.description: Helicopter flight to Simikot, then drive to Hilsa border.

itinerary.title: Hilsa to Taklakot
itinerary.description: Cross into Tibet and drive to Taklakot for acclimatization.

itinerary.title: Taklakot to Mansarovar
itinerary.description: Drive to the sacred Lake Mansarovar for holy bath and prayers.

itinerary.title: Mansarovar to Darchen
itinerary.description: Morning prayers at Mansarovar, then drive to Darchen, base for Kailash Parikrama.

itinerary.title: Kailash Parikrama Day 1
itinerary.description: Begin the sacred circumambulation of Mount Kailash.

itinerary.title: Kailash Parikrama Day 2
itinerary.description: Cross Dolma La Pass (5,630m) and complete the sacred circuit.

itinerary.title: Darchen to Taklakot
itinerary.description: Return journey to Taklakot for rest and reflection.

itinerary.title: Taklakot to Hilsa
itinerary.description: Drive back to Hilsa border.

itinerary.title: Hilsa to Simikot to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Cross back to Nepal and fly to Nepalgunj.

itinerary.title: Return to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Fly back to Kathmandu with blessed memories.

title: Langtang Valley Trek - Updated
description: Explore the beautiful Langtang Valley with stunning mountain views, rich Tamang culture, and pristine alpine lakes.

itinerary.title: Arrival and Preparation
itinerary.description: Arrive at the starting point, meet your guide, and prepare for the trek ahead.

itinerary.title: Trek Day 1
itinerary.description: Continue the trekking adventure through beautiful landscapes and local communities.

itinerary.title: Trek Day 2
itinerary.description: Continue the trekking adventure through beautiful landscapes and local communities.

itinerary.title: Trek Day 3
itinerary.description: Continue the trekking adventure through beautiful landscapes and local communities.

itinerary.title: Return Journey
itinerary.description: Complete the trek and return with unforgettable memories.

fitness_requirements: Good physical fitness required. Regular cardio exercise recommended 2-3 months before trek.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure
